channel.title: Posts on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Hugo website

item.title: The Red Sox World Series hangover, how bad was it?
item.description: Winning a championship is one of the hardest feats in sports. All the time practicing, training in the gym, and grinding it out into the season, just for a chance to raise the trophy at the end of it all. Now take it a step further and try to defend that title with the same exact team. Sounds easy enough, but for the 2019 Boston Red Sox it did not go according to plan.

item.title: How special is Mike Trout?
item.description: Baseball has been part of American history for a long time. Since the beginning of the game the face of Major League Baseball has change throughout time. From Babe Ruth, Jackie Robinson, to Barry Bonds these men have been considered the greatest in their era. Now a new era has been born and this era is fiercely competitive with promising young faces to take the role of â€œThe Face of the MLB.
